abstract: Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway cut its stake in Moody’s by 2 percent, the second reduction in two months, after the ratings firm reported two years of quarterly profit declines, Bloomberg News reported.
snippet: Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway cut its stake in Moody’s by 2 percent, the second reduction in two months, after the ratings firm reported two years of quarterly profit declines, Bloomberg News reported.
lead_paragraph: For someone known as a long-term investor, Warren E. Buffett is selling shares of Moody’s at a rapid pace.

headline.main: Buffett’s Firm Trims Stake in Moody’s Again
